name: Hanaman
description:
Hanaman has the power to stretch its nose at will.

Eating corn will give him more stretch power. 

But be careful, don't make your nose TOO LONG!

Use your nose to climb, move around and reunite with your sweetheart.

Controls:

Left/Right Arrows: Walk left/right. Also when hanging from your nose, you can move left and right

X: Jump/Start

Z: Press once to start making your nose long. Press again to stop. If the length exceeds what you can do based on the corn you have, it will reset to normal nose

This game was made in Pico8 PICO8

This is a micro project for the Jam made by Alva Majo: https://itch.io/jam/tu-juego-a-juicio-jam-2021
